name: ````Action Bike Race of Zombie Temple: Dead Chase Racing
name_original: ````Action Bike Race of Zombie Temple: Dead Chase Racing
description:
Brace yourself for an amazing adventure in Action Bike Race of Zombie Temple: Dead Chase Racing. This addicting and challenging gameplay will make you run for hours! Families and kids love it!

Guide Cool Racing Jones through the Dead Zombie Temple and get the BEST distance possible! BUT THERE'S A CATCH: You will need to avoid crazy obstacles as you run, dodge, and jump

Watch out for the crazy Zombie folks and Ghosts or prepare yourself for a lost!

Cool Racing Jones has limited life chances so cover a maximum distance as quickly as possible and set a new record on the global gamecenter leaderboard.

Challenge your friends with Nextpeer with Multiplayer compatibility

This is a universal game that works on all devices

- This version is AD SUPPORTED. Will release an AD FREE VERSION SOON

FEATURES:
- Beautiful retina graphics! Looks AMAZING
- Use intuitive touch gestures to to guide Cool Racing Jones
- Amazing animations and sound

PLEASE NOTE:
-Action Bike Race of Zombie Temple: Dead Chase Racing is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to lock out in app purchasing.
